settingsPanel.translationPromptPlaceholder: Please translate the following text to English, maintaining the original format and structure...
settingsPanel.translationPromptDefault: Please translate the following text to English, maintaining the original format and structure, without adding additional explanations or comments.
settingsPanel.contextCountHint: Provide previous text to improve translation accuracy, default is none
settingsPanel.temperatureHint: Control output randomness, 0.0-2.0, leave empty to not set (recommend lower temperature)
settingsPanel.enableThinkingHint: Enable thinking feature for supported API providers (e.g., Ollama)
settingsPanel.paragraphCharLimitHint: Set to 0 for no limit, values > 0 will merge paragraphs to reduce API calls
settingsPanel.proofreadTemperatureHint: Control proofreading output randomness, 0.0-2.0, leave empty to not set
settingsPanel.proofreadEnableThinkingHint: Enable thinking feature for supported API providers (e.g., Ollama)
settingsPanel.proofreadPromptPlaceholder: Please proofread the following translated content...

placeholders.uploadPrompt: Please upload a Markdown file to start translation

tooltips.toggleToMathJax: Click to switch to MathJax rendering
tooltips.toggleToMarkdown: Click to switch to Markdown text

messages.beforeUnloadWarning: You have untranslated content that hasn't been downloaded. Are you sure you want to leave?
messages.noOrigText: Prompt does not contain ORIGTEXT placeholder!
messages.noOrigTextOnce: Prompt must contain exactly one ORIGTEXT placeholder!

errors.invalidFileType: Please select a valid Markdown file (.md or .markdown)
errors.apiKeyRequired: Please set your API Key first
errors.translateBeforeProofread: Please translate this paragraph before proofreading
